channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Newly broken and loose paving slabs because contractors are parking on the verge, 1st October
item.description:
Broken and loose paving slabs newly broken after the previous ones were amended because contractors are parking on verges

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Pennine Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Private no-parking signs along public road side during peak time, 1st October
item.description:
21 wells close, no-parking signs are their private, according to policy and regulations, it's illegal, some are not even in front of their own house. The owner collects them in after 3:30pm for their daughter to use, which means he illegally reserved the public place for private use.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Wells Close, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: No pedestrian crossing, 1st October
item.description:
My 11 year daughter uses this bus stop . There is no pedestrian crossing with blind curves on the road which is used by cars and HGVs travelling at high speed which makes the road extremely dangerous for a child to cross . I would be grateful if a pedestrian crossing is installed at the bus stop .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A38, Twigworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: White lines faded, 30th September
item.description:
The lane markings on the roundabout are badly faded and need re-painting to help drivers safely navigate the roundabout.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmbridge Court Roundabout, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
